snippet.title: Bonkies - Announcement Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Bonkies is a couch co-op construction builder for 1-4 players featuring space-engineer monkeys on a mission to colonize the wild frontiers of our Solar System! Use jetpacks and bionic arms to raise wacky constructions, learn to work as a team and push the boundaries of monkey civilization! The game is coming to PS4 in summer 2020.

Bonkies features both single and multiplayer campaigns with tons of hand-crafted levels that require quick wits, agility, coordination and planning to solve in time. Players can choose characters from a varied cast of loveable animals (and more). The game requires quick wits, agility, coordination and planning, but is first and foremost a light-hearted and joyful take on construction builders and couch co-op games. 

Bonkies website: http://bonkiecorp.com/
Bonkies on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BonkieCorp
Bonkies on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BonkieCorp/
Developer: Studio Gauntlet https://studiogauntlet.com/
Publisher: Crunching Koalas http://crunchingkoalas.com/
